parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
the ASCII text to display
the length of the text in bytes

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *port, uint8_t col, uint8_t row)
memberdef.name: glcd_cursor_pos_set

briefdescription.para: Set text cursor position for next additions.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
the column for the cursor to be moved to (0-15)
the row it should be moved to (0 or 1)
Pointer to device structure for driver instance.

briefdescription.para: Function to change the display state.

detaileddescription.para: This function provides the user the ability to change the state of the display as per needed. Controlling things like powering on or off the screen, the option to display the cursor or not, and the ability to blink the cursor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
An 8bit bitmask of GLCD_DS_* options.

briefdescription.para: return the display feature set associated with the device

parameterdescription.para: the Grove LCD to get the display features set

simplesect.para: the display feature set associated with the device.

briefdescription.para: Function to change the input state.

detaileddescription.para: This function provides the user the ability to change the state of the text input. Controlling things like text entry from the left or right side, and how far to increment on new text

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
A bitmask of GLCD_IS_* options

briefdescription.para: return the input set associated with the device

parameterdescription.para: the Grove LCD to get the input features set

simplesect.para: the input set associated with the device.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the functional state of the display.

detaileddescription.para:
port
Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
opt
A bitmask of GLCD_FS_* options
This function provides the user the ability to change the state of the display as per needed. Controlling things like the number of rows, dot size, and text display quality.

briefdescription.para: return the function set associated with the device

parameterdescription.para: the Grove LCD to get the functions set

simplesect.para: the function features set associated with the device.

briefdescription.para: Set LCD background to a predefined color.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
One of the predefined color options

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *port, uint8_t r, uint8_t g, uint8_t b)
memberdef.name: glcd_color_set

briefdescription.para: Set LCD background to custom RGB color value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
A numeric value for the red color (max is 255)
A numeric value for the green color (max is 255)
A numeric value for the blue color (max is 255)
Pointer to device structure for driver instance.
